import { Card, CardGrid } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

## Features

Unlock the power of your component library by seamlessly publishing it to the Ethereal Nexus dashboard.
Effortlessly set up connectors to your applications and activate the components, empowering your team to immediately leverage their full potential in every project

<CardGrid stagger>
	<Card title="Component Library Management" icon="setting">
		Easily organize and maintain your component library with intuitive tools for categorization, version control, and access control.
	</Card>
    <Card title="Seamless Deployment" icon="rocket">
		Quickly deploy web components to multiple applications, CMS, and CRMs with a simple and efficient process.
	</Card>
    <Card title="Version Control" icon="puzzle">
		Keep track of component versions, rollback changes when needed, and ensure consistency across all applications.
	</Card>
    <Card title="Cross-Platform" icon="laptop">
		Ensures that your components work seamlessly across various infrastructures, frameworks, and web applications.
	</Card>
    <Card title="Real-Time" icon="approve-check-circle">
		Instantly update components across all applications with real-time synchronization for quick and efficient changes.
	</Card>
    <Card title="Collaboration" icon="heart">
		Collaborate with team members, share components, and promote reuse with built-in collaboration features.
	</Card>
</CardGrid>
